greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations in the symmetric group S_n such that the size of their centralizer is odd.
comment: a(n) is the number of n-permutations composed only of odd cycles of distinct length. - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Mar 08 2013
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..450
formula: a(n) ~ exp(-gamma/2) * n! / sqrt(2*n), where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 23 2019
a(n) = n! - A088335(n). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 27 2020
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 01 2003
